message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, I am only able to offer $15,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am unable to go above $16,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
